thread.title: Klay Thompson is not amused by guy who wants him to sign a toaster
thread.title_full: Klay Thompson is not amused by guy who wants him to sign a toaster

author: Sam Laird
title: Klay Thompson is not amused by guy who wants him to sign a toaster
text:
Klay Thompson can really light it up , so I guess this is kind of perfect? 
In any event, the internet loved it. 
SEE ALSO: How Derek Jeter's once-mocked startup became a sports media powerhouse 
Thompson, a high-scoring star for the Golden State Warriors, was presented with a rather unique item at his recent autograph-signing session. That item: a Warriors toaster. 
Here's Thompson's priceless reaction, via reddit user RDollaz , who saw his post rise to the top of the site . 

Image: rdollaz, imgur
Thompson signed that toaster, though. Oh, yes he did. 

Image: rdollaz, imgur
Thompson and RDollaz will surely cherish their magical encounter forever. 

Image: rdollaz, imgur

Image: rdollaz, imgur
And now, every morning when he heats up bread for breakfast, RDollaz can say he's getting toasted with Klay Thompson. 
WATCH: Ditch your nail and hammer. Build your dream house in just 2 days using only wooden bricks.
